item.title: [HBase] 启动内置ZooKeeper过程
item.description: start-hbase.sh hbase-daemons.sh start zookeeper zookeepers.sh --hosts /usr/local/hbase/conf/regionservers--config /usr/local/hbase/conf cd /usr/local/hbase;/usr/local/hbase/bin/hbase-daemon.sh --config /usr/local/hbase/confstart zookeeper 检查配置HBASE_MANAGES_ZK，若不为true则终止处理。 ssh node51054 cd /usr/local/hbase;/usr/local/hbase/bin/hbase-daemon.sh --config /usr/local/hbase/confstart zookeeper hbase zookeeper start java org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper.HQuorumPeer
